details.sectionContent: A software to create your own website without using single line of code
We all use numerous websites in everyday life. Hence we have a workshop on WordPress which is a software used to create websites.
This is a workshop by Rahul Banker. Participants are required to come with their laptops

Date: 22/02/2018 
  MECH IIPC HALL 
 12:30 AM to 02:30 PM
